title: No champions on champ select
body:
So I started a ranked when I saw "someone logged into your account, check ..." and it closed, so I opened it and when I logged in it was just like this, no champions, search didn't worked, changing the sorting or changing roles.
> I am spooked, pls help
 http://prntscr.com/i7ts18

replies.body:
That can happen sometimes if your network kinda loses part of the connection it has with our servers. Basically, you're still connected but it wasn't able to grab the data for what champions you own, so then you can't pick from anything. That part about "someone logging into your account" worries me though. 

First, double check your firewalls with [**these steps**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq3) to make sure those aren't blocking anything. After that, I'd really suggest to hit up account recovery in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to make sure someone else wasn't able to login to your account without you realizing.
